trans-unit.source: Serves as the base class for designers that provide design-time support in the Visual Web Designer for controls that are derived from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl"></xref> abstract class.
trans-unit.target: Fungerar som basklass för designers som ger stöd för designtid i Visual Web Designer för kontroller som härleds från den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl"> </xref> abstrakt klass.

trans-unit.source: In the Visual Web Designer, when the user switches from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes a control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> class is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: I Visual Web Designer, när användaren växlar från källan till designvyn markup källkoden som beskriver en kontroll har härletts från den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>klassen analyseras och en designläge version av kontrollen har skapats i designvyn.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>

trans-unit.source: When the user switches back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: När användaren växlar tillbaka till vyn källa, beständig markering källkoden designläge kontrollen och redigeras i koden för webbsidan.

trans-unit.source: The ListControlDesigner class serves as the base class for designers that provide design-time support in the Visual Web Designer for controls that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>.
trans-unit.target: Klassen ListControlDesigner fungerar som basklass för designers som ger stöd för designtid i Visual Web Designer för kontroller som härleds från <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>

trans-unit.source: The ListControlDesigner class properties provide the following functionality: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property returns a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> object for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Klassegenskaper ListControlDesigner erbjuda följande funktionalitet: – <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.ActionLists%2A>egenskapen returnerar en <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>objekt som innehåller vanligtvis ett objekt som har härletts från den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>objekt för varje nivå i arvsträdet av designer.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.ActionLists%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataTextField%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataValueField%2A> properties provide access to the corresponding properties of a control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> class.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataTextField%2A>Och <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataValueField%2A>Egenskaper ge tillgång till motsvarande egenskaper för en kontroll som är härledd från <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>klass.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataValueField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataTextField%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataTextField%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataValueField%2A> indicate the fields of the data source that provide the text and value content of the list items, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataTextField%2A>och <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataValueField%2A>Ange fält i datakällan som tillhandahåller texten och värdet innehåll objekten i listan respektive.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataValueField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataTextField%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ListControlDesigner class methods provide the following functionality: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataBind%2A> method binds the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> to a design-time data source.
trans-unit.target: ListControlDesigner-klassmetoder erbjuda följande funktionalitet: – <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataBind%2A>metoden Binder den associerade kontrollen som härleds från den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>till en datakälla i designläge.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataBind%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method returns the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>Returnerar metoden den kod som används för att återge den associerade kontrollen vid designtillfället.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> method returns the design-time <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> component from the associated control container.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A>Metoden returnerar designtid <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>komponenten från den associerade kontroll behållaren.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A> method returns the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> from the control container, resolved to the design-time <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataMember%2A> property of the control.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A>Metoden returnerar den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>från behållaren kontrollen matchades till designtid <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataMember%2A>egenskapen för kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.Initialize%2A> method prepares the designer to view and design the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.Initialize%2A>Metoden förbereder att visa och skapa den associerade kontrollen som härleds från <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.Initialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> method is called when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> for the associated control has changed.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>Metoden anropas när den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>för den associerade kontrollen har ändrats.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method is used to remove additional properties from, add additional properties to, or shadow properties of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>Metoden används för att ta bort ytterligare egenskaper från, lägga till ytterligare egenskaper till, eller shadow egenskaperna för den associerade kontrollen som härleds från <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> class when it creates the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> class on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework internt skapar en ny instans av den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner>klassen när det skapas den associerade kontrollen som härleds från den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>klass i designvyn.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer action list collection for the designer.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar listmängd designer åtgärd för designer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"> </xref> som associeras med designern.

trans-unit.source: Binds the specified control to the design-time data source.
trans-unit.target: Binder den angivna kontrollen till datakällan för designtid.

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner> base class, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataBind%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> object to reference the design-time data source, then calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, and then restores the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> properties to their original values.
trans-unit.target: För den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner>basklassen, den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataBind%2A>metoden anger det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>och <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>Egenskaper för den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>objekt till referens designläge datakällan anropar sedan den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden och återställer den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>och <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>egenskaper till sina ursprungliga värden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataBind%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> class, however, the DataBind method has no functionality, because <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem> objects were just added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: För den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner>klass, men metoden DataBind har inga funktioner eftersom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem>objekt har precis lagts till i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>samling.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The associated control derived from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl"></xref>, or a copy of that control.
trans-unit.target: Den associerade kontrollen har härletts från den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl"> </xref>, eller en kopia av kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data text field of the control.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger datafältet för texten i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The DataTextField property sets or retrieves the markup to use for the design-time representation of the control at run time.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen DataTextField anger eller hämtar markeringen ska användas för designtid representation av kontrollen vid körning.

trans-unit.source: This provides access via the designer to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A> property of the associated control, which corresponds to the field of the data source that provides the text content of the list items.
trans-unit.target: Detta ger åtkomst via designer till den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A>egenskapen för den associerade kontrollen som motsvarar fältet i datakällan som tillhandahåller textinnehåll objekten i listan.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField*> of the list control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField*>i kontrollen lista.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data value field of the control.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger fältet datavärde i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The DataValueField property provides access via the designer to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A> property of the associated control, which indicates the field of the data source that provides the value content of the list items.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen DataValueField ger åtkomst via designer till den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A>egenskapen för den associerade kontrollen som anger fältet i datakällan som tillhandahåller värdeinnehållet objekten i listan.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField*> of the list control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField*>i kontrollen lista.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the HTML that is used to represent the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar HTML som används för att representera kontrollen i designläge.

trans-unit.source: If the associated control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> object is data-bound, the GetDesignTimeHtml method clears the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> collection and adds a <xref:System.String> message indicating the control is data-bound.
trans-unit.target: Om den associerade kontrollen har härletts från den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>objektet är databunden, metoden GetDesignTimeHtml rensar den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>samling och lägger till en <xref:System.String>meddelande om kontrollen är databunden.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>

trans-unit.source: If the associated control is not data-bound and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> collection is empty, the GetDesignTimeHtml adds a <xref:System.String> message indicating the control is unbound.
trans-unit.target: Om den associerade kontrollen inte är databunden och <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>samling är tom, GetDesignTimeHtml lägger till en <xref:System.String>meddelande om kontrollen är obunden.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: Then, the GetDesignTimeHtml calls its base method to generate the markup.
trans-unit.target: Sedan anropar GetDesignTimeHtml dess grundläggande metod för att generera koden.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the markup used to render the control derived from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl"></xref> at design time.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>som innehåller koden som används för rendering av kontrollen har härletts från den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl"> </xref> vid designtillfället.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the data source component from the associated control container, resolved to a specific data member.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar Källkomponenten data från den associerade kontroll-behållaren matchades till medlem specifika data.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> method returns `null` if a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> property is not found, or if a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> with the same name does not exist.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A>metoden returnerar `null` om en <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>egenskapen finns inte, eller om en <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>med samma namn finns inte.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> cannot be resolved to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataMember%2A> property of the associated control, the GetResolvedSelectedDataSource returns an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface containing the design-time <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Om det <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>går inte att matcha <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataMember%2A>egenskapen för den associerade kontrollen av GetResolvedSelectedDataSource returnerar ett <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>gränssnitt som innehåller designtillfället <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> containing the design-time <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource*>, resolved to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataMember*> of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>som innehåller designtid <> </> *>, matchas med de <> </> *> av den associerade kontrollen.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Gets the data source component from the associated control container.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar Källkomponenten data från den associerade kontroll behållaren.

trans-unit.source: The GetSelectedDataSource method returns `null` if a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> property is not found, or if a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> with the same name does not exist.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetSelectedDataSource returnerar `null` om en <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>egenskapen finns inte, eller om en <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>med samma namn finns inte.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: An object implementing an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface and containing the design-time <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource*> of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Ett objekt som implementerar ett <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>gränssnitt och som innehåller designtid <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource*>av den associerade kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource*> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Förbereder att visa, redigera och skapa den associerade kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The designer host calls the Initialize method when it is ready to use the designer to render the control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> class.
trans-unit.target: Designer värden anropar initieringsmetoden när den är klar att använda designer för rendering av kontrollen som härleds från <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>

trans-unit.source: The Initialize method and its base methods configure properties and connect to events that are necessary for the operation of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Initieringsmetoden och dess grundläggande metoder konfigurera egenskaper och Anslut till händelser som är nödvändiga för åtgärden i Designer.

trans-unit.source: The `component` parameter is the control, derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>, that is associated with this designer or is a copy of that control.
trans-unit.target: Den `component` parameter är den kontroll som härletts från den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>, som är associerad med denna designer eller är en kopia av kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>

trans-unit.source: A control derived from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl"></xref> that implements an <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En kontroll som härletts från den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl"> </xref> som implementerar en <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called when the data source for the associated control has changed.
trans-unit.target: Anropas när datakällan för den associerade kontrollen har ändrats.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> base method connects the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> object to the current data source and, if that is different from the data source to which the control was connected, updates the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>basmetoden ansluter den associerade kontrollen som härleds från den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>objekt till den aktuella datakällan och om som skiljer sig från datakällan som kontrollen var ansluten till, uppdaterar designläge markup.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: The OnDataSourceChanged method updates the design-time markup after connecting to the current data source.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnDataSourceChanged uppdaterar designläge markup efter anslutning till den aktuella datakällan.

trans-unit.source: Called when the data source for the associated control has changed.
trans-unit.target: Anropas när datakällan för den associerade kontrollen har ändrats.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> base method connects the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> class to the current data source and, if that is different from the data source to which the control was connected, updates the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>basmetoden ansluter den associerade kontrollen som härleds från den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>klass som den aktuella datakällan och om som skiljer sig från datakällan som kontrollen var ansluten till, uppdaterar designläge markup.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> method of the designer unconditionally updates the design-time markup after connecting to the current data source.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>metoden i Designer uppdaterar ovillkorligt designläge markup efter anslutning till den aktuella datakällan.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of `forceUpdateView` is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Värdet för `forceUpdateView` ignoreras.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> that indicates whether the design-time markup is to be unconditionally updated.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Boolean>som anger om markeringen designläge är uppdateras ovillkorligt.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: This parameter is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Den här parametern ignoreras.

trans-unit.source: Used by the designer to remove additional properties from or add properties to the display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Används av designern för att ta bort ytterligare egenskaper från eller Lägg till egenskaper visas i den **egenskaper** rutnät eller shadow egenskaperna för den associerade kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Control designers use methods that are derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to or remove properties from the **Properties** grid.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen Designer använder metoder som är härledda från den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden skugga olika egenskaper för kontroll med motsvarande designegenskaperna som designern implementerar att lägga till egenskaper till eller ta bort egenskaper från den **egenskaper** rutnät.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For controls that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> object, the PreFilterProperties adds the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataFieldConverter> attribute to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A> properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: För kontroller som härleds från den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>objekt i PreFilterProperties lägger till den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataFieldConverter>attribut till den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A>och <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A>Egenskaper för den associerade kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataFieldConverter> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>

trans-unit.source: A collection implementing the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of the added or shadowed properties to expose for the associated control at design time.
trans-unit.target: En samling som implementerar det <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>i tillagt eller skuggad egenskaper för att exponera för den associerade kontrollen vid designtillfället.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the associated control should render its default action lists.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar ett värde som anger om den associerade kontrollen ska återge visar dess standard-åtgärd.

trans-unit.source: The UseDataSourcePickerActionList property returns `false` so that a data source dropdown is not displayed with the **Choose Data Source** menu item in the **Common Tasks** context menu.
trans-unit.target: UseDataSourcePickerActionList egenskapen returnerar `false` så att en datakälla listrutan inte visas med den **Välj datakälla** menyalternativ i det **vanliga uppgifter** snabbmenyn.

trans-unit.source: Instead, this menu item displays the **Choose Data Source** dialog box, which allows the user to select a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: I stället menyobjektet visar den **Välj datakälla** dialogrutan som tillåter användaren att välja en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>och <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A>och <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar alltid <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
